content: बालक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (लिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [बाल स्वार्थे क] {@--1@} Childlike, young, not yet fullgrown. {@--2@} Ignorant. --कः {@--1@} A child, boy. {@--2@} A minor (in law). {@--3@} A finger-ring. {@--4@} A fool or blockhead. {@--5@} A bracelet. {@--6@} The tail of a horse or elephant. {@--7@} Hair. --कं {@--1@} A finger-ring. {@--2@} A bracelet.
